ValidationRule.description: Restrict modification of Opportunities with the '3PL to OEM' or 'OEM to Customer Delivery' subtypes to users with the 'Sales Operations' or 'Order Operations' profiles.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), OR( ISPICKVAL(Sub_Type__c, "3PL to OEM transfer"), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Type__c, "OEM to Customer Delivery") ), NOT( OR( $Profile.Name = "Sales Ops Profile", $Profile.Name = "Order Operations Admin", $Profile.Name = "Samsara - Finance" ) ), NOT( OR( $Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption, $Permission.Validation_Exemption_Opportunity, $Setup.Global_Automation_Settings__c.Skip_Validation_Rule__c, $Permission.NetSuite_Service_User_Permission ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only users in the 'Sales Operations' or 'Order Operations' profiles can modify '3PL to OEM transfer' or 'OEM to Customer delivery' subtype opportunities.
